Others: The Golden State Warriors defeated the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday night by final score of 123-118.
The win improved Golden State to a very impressive 10-2 on the season, which has it just a half-game behind the Oklahoma City Thunder for the top spot in the Western Conference.
This was the second-straight loss for the Grizzlies, and it dropped them to 7-6 on the season.
There was a lot of frustration with the officiating on both sides, with the Grizzlies being especially upset at what Draymond Green was able to get away with.
There always seems to be some controversy when Golden State and Memphis play.
